title: Review and validate context generation prompt quality
description:
Human review of the context generation prompt template to ensure quality output.

## Review Checklist
- [ ] Run context generation on 3 different epics
- [ ] Evaluate context quality and relevance
- [ ] Check token count stays under limit
- [ ] Verify file references are accurate
- [ ] Assess architecture notes usefulness
- [ ] Test with different epic sizes (3, 5, 10 tasks)

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Generated context is actionable and specific
- [ ] No hallucinated file paths or types
- [ ] Conventions section matches actual codebase
- [ ] Token count consistently under 4000
- [ ] Prompt adjustments documented if needed

## Human Workflow
1. Run `ticker context <epic-id>` on test epics
2. Read generated context documents
3. Manually verify file paths exist
4. Compare context to actual codebase
5. Note any inaccuracies or missing info
6. Iterate on prompt if needed
